name: Hieroglyph: Prologue (itch)
description:
Hieroglyph: Prologue

The game is called "Hieroglyph". In this action platformer you will perform as Fenice, a person who got inside of his own consciousness. He must find the way out and lock his own demons in the deeps of heart, or "destroy" them.

  • Original soundtrack by Hate-Bit.
  • Glitchy unusual graphics.
  • Created mostly by one person.
  • Boss fights! Everyone likes them, y-y-yeah...?
  • Leap by using lanterns, enemies, their bullets!
  • Nonsense! What a nonsense inside my head!

(Game contains scenes that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy)
